summary: Changed the blades sword wearing form to include a wakizashi.
descriptionHtml:
Daisho, wearing both a long and short sword has been historically the symbol and privilege of the samurai class.

This mod adds a wakizashi to the blades swords wearing postion.

Note that the shoto is purely decorative, i.e. you can never draw it out even if you dual wield.

P.S.: 
A more appropriate wearing form of the katana is with the edge side up, however currently (before the CK is out) I have no idea how to change the default wearing position this way.  Nevertheless, just assume what you are wearing is a TACHI, which is commonly seen in armored samurai anyway.
author: Abakus
